hasuractl update
----------------

Update hasuractl

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~


Update hasuractl to a new version

::

  hasuractl update [flags]

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for update

::

      --project string   Hasura project directory where the commands should be executed. (default: current directory)
